mapper.select: select bd_id, bd_status, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_cre_date, bd_count ,m_id from ( select rownum rn, bd_id, bd_status, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_cre_date, bd_count, m_id from board where bd_id like 'nt%' and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by to_number(substr(bd_id,3)) desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select bd_id, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_count ,bd_s_date,bd_e_date,m_id from ( select rownum rn, bd_id, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_s_date,bd_e_date ,bd_count, m_id from board where bd_id not like 'nt%' and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by to_number(substr(bd_id,4)) desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select * from ( select bd_id, bd_status, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_cre_date, bd_mod_date, bd_s_date,bd_e_date ,bd_count, m_id, LEAD(bd_title,1,'다음글') OVER(ORDER BY bd_id) next_title, LEAD(bd_id,1,'다음 글이 없습니다') OVER(ORDER BY bd_id) next_id, LEAD(bd_cre_date,1) OVER(ORDER BY bd_id) next_cre_date, LAG(bd_title,1,'이전글') OVER(ORDER BY bd_id) prev_title, LAG(bd_id,1,'이전 글이 없습니다') OVER(ORDER BY bd_id) prev_id, LAG(bd_cre_date,1) OVER(ORDER BY bd_id) prev_cre_date from board where bd_id not like 'nt%' order by bd_id ) where bd_id = #{bd_id}

select bd_id, bd_status, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_cre_date, bd_count ,m_id from ( select rownum rn, bd_id, bd_status, bd_contents, bd_title, bd_cre_date, bd_count, m_id from board where bd_id like 'nt%' and bd_status = '0' and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by to_number(substr(bd_id,3)) desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from board where bd_id like 'nt%' and bd_status='0'
select count(*) from board where bd_id not like 'nt%'
